text:
@lildipshit3 @anarchomastia FYI. I work for FedEx. The cheapest way to send a Birthday Card to a rural residence is $15.50:

$7.85 base charge for a Ground 1lb. pkg going < 150 miles
$4.00 residence charge 
$3.65 rural charge

Charge for same service by USPS? 

$0.50 or 31 times cheaper 

Save the USPS
